name: Clusterpoint
description: Full Text Search NoSQL tech company
overview:
Our company develops and supports innovative IT infrastructure software technology - Clusterpoint Server - that is a full-fledged data base management system (DBMS) providing highly accurate and relevant data access, search and retrieval for Web applications.

Our technology is solving performance and scalability problems of legacy databases, at the same time adding powerful information ranking options to our customer databases. By migrating to Clusterpoint DBMS, our customers could radically improve their database application quality.

Clusterpoint Server is a full-fledged document-oriented DBMS platform with a strong focus on full text search and an XML/JSON-based API. The software platform has been engineered with performance and scalability in mind, to satisfy the needs of large web applications. The concept behind Clusterpoint Server includes three basic idea: nearly linear scalability, fast search, custom relevancy for search quality.

milestones.description: Clusterpoint has secured EUR 1mln from BaltCap
milestones.source_description: Cloud based DBMS provider Clusterpoint secures €1 million from Baltcap
